Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Fusarium oxysporum (86% inhibition at 10 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (41% inhibition at 10 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Plant defense peptide with antifungal activity against F. oxysporum and Botrytis cinerea.
Sequence Information.Domain: The presence of a 'disulfide through disulfide knot' structurally defines this protein as a knottin (By similarity).
Sequence Information.Biophysicochemical properties: pH dependence (Stable under extremes of pH); Temperature dependence (Stable under extremes of temperature).

Literature.Title: Isolation and properties of floral defensins from ornamental tobacco and petunia.
Literature.Author: Lay FT, Brugliera F, Anderson MA.
